name: The Sleeper
description:
ASDW / Arrow Keys to Move, Space to Burrow, Escape to Pause Game

This is a short stealth game made in under 72 hours for the Retro Game Jam hosted by FlyingFish in November 2020. The theme was "Undead." Any resemblance to your favorite ghost story is strictly a matter of homage, or parody. :)

I chose a classic Game Boy color palette, and went with a simple stealth gameplay. If I ever build this out to a bigger game, I have a few ideas about what I'd redo and what I'd add...
This was my first game jam! It was somewhat harrowing, especially when my builds kept breaking and/or displaying new bugs. Enjoy. :)
